title: Copy text from table
preconditions: User is logged in and on the table page.
steps:
1. Locate the table on the page.
2. Select a cell in the table.
3. Right-click on the selected cell.
4. Choose 'Copy' from the context menu.
5. Paste the copied content into a plain text editor.
expected: The pasted content should match the plain text of the cell without any styling or formatting.
